MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:14pm due to a fault on the electrical network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8:14 PM on Wednesday, 06 January 2021.
